derivation: a primitive root; also as denominative from H1167 (בַּעַל)
outline:
1. to marry, rule over, possess, own
    1. (Qal)
      1. to marry, be lord (husband) over
      2. to rule over
    2. (Niphal) to be married
kjv_def: have dominion (over), be husband, marry(-ried, [idiom] wife).
strongs_def: to be master; hence, to marry
